mapper.sql: c.course_id, c.course_name, c.major_id, c.course_desc, c.status, c.course_img, c.create_time, c.update_time, c.lesson_hours, c.approval_required, m.major_name AS major_name
mapper.select: SELECT , GROUP_CONCAT(u.nick_name) AS teacher_names, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM edu_course_student cs WHERE cs.course_id = c.course_id) AS student_count FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_course_teacher ct ON c.course_id = ct.course_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ct.teacher_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN edu_major m ON m.major_id = c.major_id WHERE c.course_id = #{courseId} GROUP BY c.course_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edu_course (course_name, major_id, course_desc, status, course_img, lesson_hours, create_time, approval_required) VALUES (#{courseName}, #{majorId}, #{courseDesc}, #{status}, #{courseImg}, #{lessonHours}, #{createTime}, #{approvalRequired})
mapper.select: SELECT teacher_id FROM edu_course_teacher WHERE course_id = #{courseId}

SELECT , GROUP_CONCAT(u.nick_name) AS teacher_names, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM edu_course_student cs WHERE cs.course_id = c.course_id) AS student_count FROM edu_course c INNER JOIN edu_course_teacher ect ON c.course_id = ect.course_id LEFT JOIN edu_course_teacher ct ON c.course_id = ct.course_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ct.teacher_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN edu_major m ON m.major_id = c.major_id WHERE ect.teacher_id = #{teacherId} GROUP BY c.course_id ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT , GROUP_CONCAT(u.nick_name) AS teacher_names, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM edu_course_student cs WHERE cs.course_id = c.course_id) AS student_count FROM edu_course c INNER JOIN edu_course_student ecs ON c.course_id = ecs.course_id LEFT JOIN edu_course_teacher ct ON c.course_id = ct.course_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON ct.teacher_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN edu_major m ON m.major_id = c.major_id WHERE ecs.student_id = #{userId} GROUP BY c.course_id ORDER BY ecs.create_time DESC
